page.title: 04THE ESSEX CHRONICLE
page.content:
{The Essex Chronicle}newspapers group employs 204 people in the area, who work on five papers. These are: Essex Chronicle/Brentwood Gazette/Romford Observer/Billericay Gazette/Woodham and Wickford Chronicle.
The Essex Chronicle is sold throughout central Essex as far as Braintree/ Witham/Maldon. The Brentwood Gazette is sold as far south as Ongar. Most of the employees work at the { Westway}premises,in the{Widford industrial area of Chelmsford.
In the company, 47 people work in the Editorial department,42 work in the Advertising department and 90 work on Production and Printing. Some 250,000 local people read the {121,000 copies}of these ppers which are printed each week.
